name: Radio Monster
description:
----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----

Travel, Eat and Take people’s stuff as PASTA, a female Space Pirate Clone working for a galactic radio corporation.

----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----

GAMEPLAY

You got to collect all the Cannelloni, Palm-Heart Cans and Money before the time runs out but watch-out! Every time you catch something, the locals will take notice of you, once the Watched bar reaches the top you'll fail the mission!

TIP: Floor's collisions extend a bit farther than what it seems ;)

----x-----x-----x-----x-----x----- 

CONTROLS

W A S D - MOVEMENT
MOUSE - CAMERA
SPACE BAR - JUMP and ACCEPT
P - LEVEL RESET
ESC - ESCAPE GAME

----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----

My entry to the 32bit Game Jam, got in kinda late, spent more time doing the music which I couldnt set up for the specific levels they are meant to (You can still listen to this tracks in the Level Select screen!).

Pretty satisfied with how fast I pulled this together (around 5 days music, 3 and a half days everything else), development will continue for sure.

Beach was meant to have Music 5 and Mall the second Music 7. The song that plays in all of the levels is Music 6 and it's called "Yes Doctor Please Give me More".

----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----

TECHNICAL DIFFICULTIES?

If the game isnt loading, refresh the page or try with a different browser!
If you experience any other issues please let me know.

----x-----x-----x-----x-----x-----
